difficulty losing weight." }, ]; const LabTest = () => { const [selectedTest, setSelectedTest] = useState(null); return (

Lab Test Information

Select a test to view details and pricing information.

{labTests.map((test, index) => (
setSelectedTest(selectedTest === index ? null : index)} >
{test.name}
{test.price}

)}
))}
); }; export default LabTest;
